sourcesContent:
import "@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css"; import "../Styles/HomePage.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const products = [ { img: "/img/1.png", name: "Pizza Hành Tây", price: "$25.00" }, { img: "/img/2.png", name: "Pizza Hải Sản", price: "$35.00" }, { img: "/img/3.png", name: "Pizza Bò Băm", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/4.png", name: "Pizza Ngũ Hành", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/5.png", name: "Pizza Hawaii", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/6.png", name: "Pizza Margherita", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/7.png", name: "Pizza Pepperoni", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/8.png", name: "Pizza Pesto", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/9.png", name: "Pizza Nấm", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/10.png", name: "Pizza Gà", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/11.png", name: "Pizza Nhân Nhồi ", price: "$45.00" }, { img: "/img/12.png", name: "Pizza Phô Mai", price: "$45.00" }, ]; export default function HomePage() { return (

Pizza Shop

{products.map((product, index) => (

{product.name}

Price: {product.price}

))}
); }
